product_name: Seattle Sports Titan 1500 Panniers - Pair - Special Buy
long_description: Seattle Sports Titan 1500 panniers shield your gear from wet, rainy weather and help you balance your load for a comfortable ride. Polyvinyl chloride and coated nylon fabric keep the elements out; rolltop closure is easy to use. Exterior zippered pocket features a coated zipper for superior weather protection. Compression straps secure the load for balanced riding; heavy-duty clips easily attach to bike rack (not included). 18-liter capacity holds a change of clothes, your lunch and other daily essentials. Please note the Seattle Sports Titan 1500 panniers are sold as a pair. Special buy.
short_description: Seattle Sports Titan 1500 panniers shield your gear from wet, rainy weather and help you balance your load for a comfortable ride.
